title: 107_s3009
content: Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002 - Amends the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002 to extend the TEUCA program through weeks of unemployment ending before July 1, 2003 . Entitles eligible individuals in all States to a total of 26 weeks of TEUCA compensation . Provides an additional seven weeks of TEUCA benefits for workers in high unemployment States . Applies a revised adjusted insured unemployment rate State trigger. Sets an additional TEUCA benefit period State trigger based on total unemployment rate.
